title: Peramuna Mawatha, Kadawatha
details:
Good Residential rectangular Land in Kadawatha (Peramuna Mawatha)

Very peaceful and tranquil surrounding, Good Neighborhood

Very Closer to Colombo - Matara Southern expressway

30 feet more road frontage
It’s Land facing a 20 feet road

200 metrs to Main road (Kandy Road)
1.5 km to Kadawatha Town

Land extent – 9.7 perches
Total Price Rs 5 Million (negotiable)
